fields.label: Date Range
fields.description: How many days in the future would you like to query?

fields.label: Date Window
fields.description: How many days would you like to include in the query?

fields.label: Patron Types
fields.description: Select the patron types that you would like to include in your expiring patrons query.

fields.label: Administrators
fields.description: Select the users that you would like to help administrator this application.

fields.label: Source
fields.description: This will be the from sender value in each email notification.

fields.label: Subject
fields.description: This will be the notification email subject line.
